title: Font identification of CFDA Awards logo
content:
Hello everybody!

Does anybody know which font was used as a base for the CFDA Fashion Awards logo as seen on this sponsored photo background behind Eva Mendes here?

[http://omg.yahoo.com/the-cfda-fashion-awards/photos/1949#id=1](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020010205/http:/omg.yahoo.com/the-cfda-fashion-awards/photos/1949#id=1 "http://omg.yahoo.com/the-cfda-fashion-awards/photos/1949#id=1")

Thanks a lot in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [2654\_2062917592.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020010205/http:/typophile.com/files/2654_2062917592.jpg) | 49.98 KB |
author: iconique

comments.content: Yep. HTF Didot 96 Light. I think they've been squooshed a bit too, but nothing too harmful.
Thanks! Simply love the Didot family and it's just what I needed to make a magazine I am making better :)!
